## MapViewOptions.polarStyleSetName property

The name of the \[\[StyleSet\]\] used by \[\[PolarTileDataSource\]\] to evaluate for the decoding. Default is `"polar"`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
polarStyleSetName?: string;
```
